title: >>> SURVIVAL Saturday
body_text:
It's about as real as it can get.
The invasion has been the talk of the town and there is no turning back.
There has been no resistence from either side; no quit whatsoever. If dodgeball is attacked, one can bet it will be met with a heavy counter-offensive. Dodgeball has become more than just a game in the past year, but a bond between brothers looking out for their own. The group of over one year is perhaps more ready than ever before.
It's an army of one. You won't see Adams vs. Adams, Tronolone vs. Fitzpatrick, or Pierce vs. DiBuccio. The rivals-turned teammates will fight together as a unit.
Here is a list of some of the heavy hitters scheduled to appear at DODGEBALL LX3(as of November 10th, 2:27am): Kevin Fitzpatrick, Kevin Adams, Tom Adams, Justin Pierce, Diana DiBuccio, among others. It's safe to say that rivalries and feuds will be set aside for this one.
________________________________________
___________________________
"I cannot remember that last time I was this excited for an event. Aside from the ten-events, this may very well be the biggest one of them all. It's so unpredictable in so many ways, only creating further buzz and excitement for perhaps us and maybe 'them'. And right at a time dodgeball needed an extra boost, an attack heads our way. Hope you're ready, because I am!"
JOHN TRONOLONE
2:34am
November 10th, 2006
